titleStmt.title: Elegy on the death of Her Highness Mary Princess Dowager of Aurange daughter to Charles the First, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, &c.
titleStmt.author: Bold, Henry, 1627-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edward Husbands, and are to be sold at the sign of the Golden Dragon in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: In verse - "Hail Graceful Mary! Summon'd up to be,".
Signed: Hen. Bold. olim Ã¨ N.C. Oxon.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 247) and in the Harvard University Library (reel 1790).
